posts.name: Audrey Jane's Pizza Garage
posts.note: Audrey Jane's Pizza Garage is a family-owned and operated pizza parlor focusing on fresh ingredients and delicious flavors. Their pizzas are made lovingly in-house and from scratch. Order the Spicy Pig pizza which consists of hand-crushed tomato sauce, mozzarella, natural casing pepperoni, Italian sausage, roasted jalape√±os, fresh garlic, oregano. Or the Meatball Grinder which contains homemade meatballs, mozzarella, hand-crushed tomato sauce, and oregano or the Eggplant Grinder with roasted eggplant, ricotta, garlic, hand-crushed tomato sauce, mozzarella, Parmesan cheese, and basil.

posts.name: Blue Sparrow Coffee
posts.note: Blue Sparrow Coffee is committed to their neighborhood, the people who work here and live here. They strive to serve you the best coffee in a friendly, comfortable environment. Blue Sparrow Coffee has partnered with local food providers bringing you the highest quality products from Enzo the Baker, Marczyk Fine Foods, and Genova's Biscotti.

posts.name: Denver Biscuit Company
posts.note: Denver Biscuit Company is a biscuit-based breakfast and sandwich shop set up inside the warehouse-like Atomic Cowboy bar. You need to order one of their biscuit sandwiches such as the club with fried chicken, bacon, and cheddar cheese or a biscuit French toast with sausage, egg, and cheese covered with maple syrup.

posts.name: The Post Chicken and Beer
posts.note: The Post Chicken and Beer is an upbeat, casual spot serving up fried chicken, comfort-food sides, plus local beer, and cocktails. You need to order the fried chicken and the chicken Chicharrones; fried chicken skin served with a pinto bean hummus.

posts.name: Skirted Heifer
posts.note: Skirted Heifer serves burger and bun options with choose-your-own toppings. Don't forget to go with fries and frozen custard in their funky digs. The restaurant focuses on not only grass-fed beef but grass finished beef. Not only for the nutritional factor but for taste. The Skirted Heifer decided to make their own condiments and sauces homemade. You should order the skirted heifer burger with fries.

posts.name: Steuben's Food Service
posts.note: Steuben's Food Service is a classic regional American favorite's place, and cocktails make up the menu at this buzzing, retro-style diner. You need to order the fried chicken with mashed potatoes, gravy, and biscuit.

posts.name: The Roost
posts.note: The Roost is a rustic-chic hangout with New American pub grub and local craft beers, along with live music and a rooftop bar. Order the banging cauliflower and the perfect pork sandwich.
